thread.title: BRIEF-Yangtze River Port And Logistics ‍Board Authorized Plan For Spin-Off Involving Yangtze River Blockchain Logistics

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Yangtze River Port And Logistics ‍Board Authorized Plan For Spin-Off Involving Yangtze River Blockchain Logistics
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Yangtze River Port And Logistics Ltd :
* YANGTZE RIVER PORT AND LOGISTICS LTD - ‍BOARD AUTHORIZED PLAN FOR SPIN-OFF INVOLVING YANGTZE RIVER BLOCKCHAIN LOGISTICS LIMITED
* YANGTZE RIVER PORT AND LOGISTICS LTD - ‍PURSUANT TO SPIN-OFF, SHARES OF SUBSIDIARY WILL BE DISTRIBUTED TO STOCKHOLDERS OF COMPANY ON A PRO RATA BASIS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
